name: soco
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for Scenes of Crime Officer: a person whose job is to collect evidence from the place where a crime has taken place for the British police: The detective waited as the SOCO, a young woman in white overalls, finished filming the scene.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Chief Superintendent reviewed the photographs and diagrams of the house which the SOCO had put together. The police surgeon and SOCO were already at the scene.Waiting for the Home Office pathologist, the SOCO spent his time drawing plans of the room and taking a few measurements.SOCOs are civilians employed by the police force.
